mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION(TITLE, CONTENT, USER, DATE) VALUE(#{title}, #{content}, #{user}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE TITLEID=Q.ID) AS COUNT, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.USER, Q.DATE FROM QUESTION Q ORDER BY Q.DATE DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT Q.ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE TITLEID=Q.ID) AS COUNT, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.USER, Q.DATE FROM QUESTION Q WHERE Q.TITLE LIKE '%${questionKey}%' ORDER BY Q.DATE DESC LIMIT 0,10
SELECT COUNT(C.TITLEID) FROM (SELECT MAX(COM.TITLEID) AS MAXID FROM COMMENT COM,QUESTION QUE WHERE COM.TITLEID = QUE.ID) T,COMMENT C WHERE T.MAXID = C.TITLEID;
SELECT Q.ID, Q.TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE TITLEID=Q.ID) AS COUNT FROM QUESTION Q WHERE Q.ID >= #{ranParam} AND Q.ID <= #{ranParam}+1
SELECT C.ID, C.TITLE, C.COUNT FROM (SELECT Q.ID, Q.TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT WHERE TITLEID=Q.ID) AS COUNT FROM QUESTION Q) C WHERE C.COUNT <= #{maxParam} AND C.COUNT >= (#{maxParam}-3)
